description:
Work your way from beginner status to an advanced user, with this Microsoft Windows 7 training from ClipTraining. Learn windows 7 as a Microsoft professional takes you through a comprehensive instructional Windows 7 training series that starts with an introduction to this operating system and then moves you through applications, security, control panel and administration.

The amount of need-to-know information does not end there. With this Windows 7 training, ClipTraining has included its Windows 7 for Admins videos. This is an extra 20 part Advanced Windows 7 Features series with everything that you’ll need to know to continue your professional development status.

With the more than 75 videos and over 6 hours of step-by-step instruction, ClipTraining teaches you what you need to know in the minimal time it takes to Learn windows 7. This vast amount of video time is not filled with fluff; rather it is concise training from the e-learning experts.

Along with the task-based, to-the-point videos, you’ll receive an excellent downloadable ‘ClipStart’ PDF with helpful tips to get you started.

You’ll never know all that the Microsoft Windows 7 operating system has to offer until you take this Windows 7 training course.

</p>
title: Learn Microsoft Windows 7
